tokens.resolved_gloss: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
tokens.translation: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix

tokens.resolved_gloss: to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
tokens.translation: to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to scratch, i.e. (by implication) to engrave, plough; hence (from the use of tools) to fabricate (of any material); figuratively, to devise (in a bad sense); hence (from the idea of secrecy) to be silent, to let alone; hence (by implication) to be deaf (as an accompaniment of dumbness)

tokens.resolved_gloss: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
tokens.translation: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
